title: Platform Type
description: A functional category of observation platforms such as Float, Wave Glider, or Tide Guage.

id.description: Internal identifier for the platform type.

name.description: Name of the platform type (e.g., Argo Float, Glider).

description.description: Description of the general characteristics or use of this platform type.

family.description: The broader platform family to which this type belongs (e.g., Subsurface Profiler, Moored Buoy, or Fixed Station).
